commenter_b: Really?....Belgium. Some of the nicest people in Europe. There is no reason in these people. They just hate everybody. Sympathy to the Belgian people. I have visited your country and was impressed with your quality.
post_message: NPR is following the deadly attacks in Brussels. -- At least 30 people died in explosions at the airport and a metro station.  -- Some 200 were injured, including at least one U.S. service member and his family. -- ISIS has claimed responsibility for the attacks, and police released a photo of a suspect.

commenter_b: Er, spider silk has almost nothing to do with a spider's reproductive system, other than if some species use it for mating rituals. So I don't think you can rape a spider. If they were to take off the harmless pins, it would find a corner and immediately start building a web, because it's a spider and it has no conscience. The closest I can relate to this spider is giving blood.
